use.flag: Uses app-misc/tmux to instantize this application
Extends games-server/mta-server's connectivity with ml_sockets.so. See https://wiki.multitheftauto.com/wiki/Modules/Sockets

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi Theft Auto (MTA) is a software project that adds network play functionality to Rockstar North's Grand Theft Auto game series, in which this functionality is not originally found. It is a unique modification that incorporates an extendable network play element into a proprietary commercial single-player PC game.
